You look at things in absolute: You view an event as a never-ending pattern of defeat.
You dwell on the negatives and ignore the positives
You insist your positive qualities do not count.
You jump to conclusions not warranted by facts.
You assume that people are reacting negatively to you.
You predict that things will turn out badly.
You blow things way out of proportion in either direction.
You reason from your feelings-- I feel like an idiot
Instead of saying --I made a mistake.-- you tell yourself
You blame yourself for something you were not entirely responsible for.
You blame others and overlook ways you contributed to the problem.
